cards.title: Role-Playing Game
cards.description: A platform for creating and participating in role-playing adventures, with the ability to manage game elements, interact between participants, and customize adventures extensively.
posibilites: Create and join adventures with customizable storylines, mechanics, and maps.
Add threads and posts, including private and public discussions.
Note templates (characters, locations, weapons, items, etc.).
Interactive maps with the ability to add notes.
Access control (hidden posts, guest links, participant management).
Subscriptions and notifications for new posts and threads.
Comments and reactions, ability to delete your own posts and leave adventures.

cards.title: Legal System
cards.description: SPA application for interacting with digital versions of internal organizational documents. Allows users to view, comment, and manage access to documents in a user-friendly interface.
posibilites: Role-based system and authorization using JWT and React Router.
View, search, and filter electronic documents.
Access level configuration for users and groups.
E2E testing of access rights, reducing bugs by 20%.
Responsive design for proper display on different screens.
